recipes.uninstall: Uninstalls mariadb and clears repository configuration
recipes.purge: Uninstalls packages and manually removes all known directories
recipes.install_multi_server: Installs, runs and configures multi-server setup of mariadb on single node
recipes.purge_multi_server: Removes configuration of multiserver and calls purge script
recipes.setup_multi_server: Removes current version and makes fresh installation of multiple servers
